name: Cult Manager Tycoon
description:
Manage resources like Mojo, Money, and Legitimacy to take your cult mainstream.

Text-based choices: Select Holidays and Revelation Passages that please your followers and keep them Devoted.

The better your Revelation  text selections each round, the more followers you Convert. This means more Donations and the chance for better classes of worshipers that increase your Legitimacy.

Achieve 100% Legitimacy for one of three possible endings!

Please note: This game is in ENGLISH ONLY and is not recommended for non-fluent speakers.

Gameplay features

- Complete Mission Goals for rewards

- Hire, Actualize, and Equip staff

- Unlock and use special arcane Tech

- Plagiarize other faiths

- Make text-based Choices that have immediate consequences

- Have Visions and perform Miracles

Proselytize for converts, preach to your worshipers, Actualize Hosts, perform Miracles, become a political power, found your own fiefdom, become a living god!

Manage and grow your cultists in a satirical cult tycoon game packed with humor!

Notice: I originally published Cult Manager Tycoon on Google Play, but keeping up with that platforms regulations became too onerous, so I took it down. Then someone on reddit suggested publishing it here. I hope you enjoy it!
